reviews.text: Fantastic hand rolls, quick and friendly service. Get the flight of five of them!
This place is not on par with some of the other excellent Japanese offerings in Greenpoint. Very average sushi, and disappointing with the price point.
Delicious! Wagyu, eel and scallop were my favorite. Surprisingly very filling!
The Chef‚Äôs Tasting is wonderful. So many tasty rolls

We ordered the Classic Set, four √† la carte hand rolls, and the Knori Bowl ‚Äî and every single bite was outstanding! The ingredients tasted exceptionally fresh, and the presentation was beautiful. The service was friendly, attentive, and made the whole experience even better. Highly recommend for anyone who appreciates top-quality sushi and great hospitality
Good Handroll spot in Greenpoint!

A true neighborhood gem! Everything we had from the hand rolls and sashimi to the soup ‚Äî was so fresh and absolutely delicious. The service was warm and attentive, and the chef/owner was incredibly welcoming and kind. It‚Äôs the perfect spot for any occasion or even a casual weeknight bite. We can‚Äôt wait to become regulars!
So good!
Loved everything. We‚Äôve had both flights of hand rolls and they are great. We also tried the a5 wagyu roll- nice charred flavor
Delicious hand rolls! I loved the wagyu
Food was so fresh and so good, staff (Stephanie!) is SO kind and accommodating and helpful. We loved our time here and can't wait to be regulars!! Please come here!

The food is incredible & Stephanie is the absolute best ‚Äî I genuinely would recommend this place time and time again. From the Bluefin Tuna roll to Salmon to Eel to Waygu, everything was genuinely so delicious.
Very tasty. The A5 hit.
Great vibes, good food, each handroll was individually packaged nicely üòÅ
Food was absolutely phenomenal and everyone was so friendly. Stephanie and the chef Golden, really made my night. Definitely try the wagyu. It's the good stuff
Amazing food and service. The toro and the wagyu were PHENOMENAL. Thank you folks for making such a beautiful, memorable dinner!
Delicious fish! And very nice service. Will definitely be back.

Amazing experience! The atmosphere is so calming - a great break from New York!

Chef did an incredible job at creating such fresh food and the $36 menu was great value!

The food was super fresh and delicious! Everything tasted authentic and full of flavor. The presentation was beautiful. The staff were friendly and the atmosphere was calm and welcoming. Definitely a place I‚Äôd visit again!
Absolutely delicious! Probably the best sushi I‚Äôve had outside of LA. I highly recommend the scallop and snow crab rolls. I‚Äôll be back soon!

Sashimi appetizer very good
Fish hand rolls were great
Wagyu hand roll is decent but not worth eating less fish
Great new place, great prices and selection. Can be difficult to bite handroll neatly without fish and toppings falling off. However, quality of fish is really good. Definitely recommend!
Very good atmosphere, the rolls were very delicious, fish was fresh.. and the association with rice was pretty good too, i will come back for lunch
Amazing experience! The rolls were all delicious, the quality is excellent, and the service is top-notch. I‚Äôd definitely come back!!
Unreal! The wagyu and eel and crab were standouts but honestly it was all incredible.

Incredibly fresh fish,  some of the best we've found in all of NYC/ Brooklyn over the last 30 years.

Only downside was the interior smells too clean, that floral disinfectant smell (luckily,  not strong enough to affect the meal, but it was strong enough before dinner arrived to makes us talk about it). Easy fix that I hope the  owners/manager make! Glad to know the place is super clean,  but the heavenly delicate fish shouldn't  be overpowered by that.

Amazing handroll in Greenpoint!
The premium menu was amazing, and Stephanie was great and managed my intolerances!
Thank you, we‚Äôll be back üòÅ
Excellent food and service !
I never really was into hand rolls before but this place is amazing.
The rice is as incredibly well seasoned! Ample fish provided very good deal!! Thanks will be back!!
Sooo yummy - the rice was amazing
Incredible sushi, must get the eel, wagyu and fatty blue fin
Amazing undercover spot. High quality fish , cool staff !
Amazing quality, the blue fin melted in my mouth and the wagyu was so soft and just hit the spot.
Really enjoyed the premium set handrolls. Premium quality and good fish to rice ratio! Nice atmosphere and service is also amazing.

Obsessed with this new handroll place in green point! The food is incredibly fresh, portions are generous, and service is 10/10. I‚Äôve been here twice since it‚Äôs opening and will definitely be back.
Loved the food and service!
Such a great new greenpoint spot. Incredible food and great service. Will definitely be coming back!
The premium handroll entree was so delicious and fresh. The miso soup was also so good. Wish I got two!

zero vibe. i felt like i stepped into a sheepshead bay restaurant where sushi artists wear lab coats. I chose the middle option for $42 hard earned dollars. The beers are all bottle, no draft, decided to pass on that. The first nori sandwich came out and after 2 bites it was gone, the same happened to the other 4, after 15 mins I was done, and hungry. I think no normal person will be full after 5, you need about 7-8 to feel fine, but at about 60$ you might as well just go to a normal sushi restaurant. The food is good, just too small and pricey. I wont be going back.
High quality and very fresh.
Awesome little joint for some hand rolls!

We randomly decided to get dinner here when walking past it and are so glad we did! Delicious hand rolls - every one we tried was amazing. Super nice GM and server. Recommend sitting at the bar if you can. Go support this new-ish restaurant, you won't regret it!
Very clean and tidy, great and affordable hand rolls!

My new favorite dinner place!! Knori is all about hand rolls ‚Äî high-quality ingredients, fast-casual vibes, and tasting menus that don‚Äôt mess around. From bluefin tuna with onion crunch to scallop, snow crab, and even uni + caviar, this spot is bringing something fresh to the neighborhood.‚ù§Ô∏è
Pretty tasty foie gras is the best
Such an amazing lunch!
Fresh sushi, great flavors, and quick service. The rolls were delicious and everything tasted really high quality. Definitely a spot I‚Äôd come back to.
solid handrolls prepared quickly, great for a quick lunch but you don‚Äôt hafta rush like me üòÇ

Food was excellent! Very fresh fish and friendly staff. Our favorite was the hamachi yellowtail!

Will come back any time.

5 stars! We're so happy to stumble across this restaurant! It has the best hand rolls. Authentic and delicious. The staff is super friendly. The atmosphere is so relaxing and comfortable with great music. I highly recommend to everyone!

The space is beautiful and the fish is quality here absolutely perfect meal and a spot I am highly recommending. Must try that KNORI bowl, and the eel Handroll

üíµLUNCH SPECIAL: 3 Handrolls for $21
üê† KNORI Bowl (seen in video): only $38!
üç∫ $7 Sapporo

I enjoyed dinner here on a Monday night. My partner and I were celebrating, so we chose the Chef Tasting Menu which notes on the menu it comes with an appetizer, fresh fish and handrolls. I wasn't quite sure what to expect, but I was pleasantly surprised! The appetizer had an array of 3 hearty bites featuring fresh seafood. Second course was nigiri which tasted really good and were large pieces of fish. The handrolls were great quality too, and at the end of the meal my boyfriend and I left full. I recommend the counter seating, specifically the one facing the kitchen curtain (so perpendicular to the work station), because we got great views of the sushi chef!

Found this place by walking by. Stopped here for dinner at the counter during their soft opening. We‚Äôd never been to a strictly hand roll sushi experience before and this place knocked it out of the park. We went for The Premium and for $42 we left sufficiently full. Everything was so fresh and properly proportioned. The staff were so nice. You should try this place!

My only suggestion would be to switch up the playlist from hotel lobby bar to something more lo-fi beats.

My girlfriend and I saw a new hand roll bar in the neighborhood and we just had to try it out. Who doesn‚Äôt want to try out a new handroll/omakase spot? We tried the Chef Tasting Menu and it was really good. We also had a couple nigiris and it was delicious. The fish was high quality and extremely fresh. You know they don‚Äôt skip out on the ingredients. Each handroll had a unique taste that just satisfies your taste buds every bite. They provided excellent service. Will definitely come back again! 10/10!

Love it ! Greenpoint needs more restaurants like this. Simple menu serving small sushi tacos / hand rolls. Great for lunch or dinner.  The owner was there and was so kind and committed to serving healthy good sushi.
The very best Japanese restaurant in the neighborhood. The chef is so friendly and accommodating, as well as the entire staff. Incredibly tasty and fresh fish. True hidden gem. Run, don‚Äôt walk!

New hand roll restaurant hits the scene and hits the spot. I sat at the bar and ordered The Classic assortment of five individually served hand rolls which ended up being the perfect amount. Very good quality fish. Such a pleasant surprise addition to Greenpoint Ave.

My family is a group of four and we all ate about 4 of the hand rolls. We really enjoyed the food and the service was super nice. It took a moment to understand how to eat the hand rolls, but the quality was amazing.
Had a great experience here! Loved the appetizer that came with the classic hand roll set. Everything tasted so fresh and was a fun experience - definitely coming back!

Best eel avocado roll and shrimp rolls I‚Äôve ever had, by far! My husband had different rolls and he loved them as well. Must try this place, it‚Äôs deliciously different. I will frequent Knori‚Äî my new spot for  sushi üç£‚ù§Ô∏è

This place was so good. Came on a weekday and there was plenty of seating. Everything tasted fresh and amazing. The staff was incredibly friendly and hospitable.

Highly recommend if you‚Äôre in the mood for hand rolls.
We tried Knori for the first time and can definitely say we will be back! The hand rolls were fantastic - everything was so fresh and tasted amazing. Happy to have them in them in the neighborhood!

SUCH GREAT QUALITY & VALUE!!! I wanted to keep this secret gem to myself, but also want to make sure the kind owners get the bustling  business it deserves‚Ä¶ we got 3x Premium set between 2 of us because it was so so so good. Everything was great proportions, clearly healthy and fresh, and thoughtfully put together! Thank you for a wonderful experience!

I came because I saw this spot featured on greenpointers, and I love supporting new spots. I was truly blown away. I‚Äôve been on a quest the last few years to find the best handroll spot across the city, and this place is now my number #1.

The service was great, and the owner was there and was so sweet. I really was shocked this place wasn‚Äôt body to body with a line outside but this feels like one of those places that‚Äôs it‚Äôs only a matter of time. Run!

Very Rarely I give any place perfect score but this was super. Had a great time speaking with the chefs and staff food was amazing. Strongly recommended to everyone. I food was priced appropriately and incredibly DeliciousI

Such a cute new place with really tasty and fresh hand rolls. I‚Äôve ordered few of them √† la carte , but next time I will definitely try one of the sets. My favorites were: Shrimp , spicy salmon and eel foie gras.

SENSAAAATIONAL! 10000/10- some of the most delicious, fresh sushi we‚Äôve ever had! We actually could not stop talking about how incredible it was with every bite. The service was just as fabulous- Stephanie was so attentive and sweet! We will 100% be back again and again

They just had a soft opening on June 9th and the service was above and beyond. The food was served really fast and the hand rolls were fresh. The restaurant was clean and the items are fairly priced. Def worth a try

This hand roll place is a great new addition to Greenpoint! Their classic deal is a great deal with a variety of high quality fish / scallop. The kampachi and scallop were standouts - very fresh. Portions are reasonable though you won‚Äôt be stuffed. Service also good - our waiter checked in at least twice though getting the food took a bit longer than average.

I‚Äôm genuinely baffled at how this place has 5 stars. The prices aren‚Äôt that good and the fish quality is borderline bad. This bowl was $50 and I couldn‚Äôt finish it. Bitter flavor at the end of the palate shows the lack of freshness. Even‚Ä¶

So happy to have this place in the neighbourhood for a perfect low key dinner! The fish is super high quality and the chef seasons it to perfection, some of the best hand rolls I‚Äôve had in NY. Will definitely be back!

What a new hidden gem in the neighborhood! My friend and I got the premium tasting, which came with 5 different rolls and they were all delicious and fresh. It also came with a sashimi appetizer which was just as delicious. The staff was so kind, we‚Äôll definitely be back to try the other rolls.
Great handroll spot with a good deal on the set, fresh fish, excellent service, and nice presentation. Definitely coming back!

I had a delightful experience and the service is amazing - Stephanie is the best!! The hand rolls are intentionally crafted and delicious!! I highly recommend stopping by if you have not had the chance to do so already!!

Delicious meal and good service. I got the classic option with five rolls‚Äîtuna, kampachi, salmon, scallop, and shrimp (I ate one before the photo). My favorites were the salmon and shrimp. Worth a visit, and I‚Äôll be sure to return.
Late night experience is great! Serve food till 10:30pm on weekday! Nice new spot in the area if you are craving for some fresh üêü
Amazing hand roll experience! Such a good deal and the food was delicious and beautiful. I had the classic set plus an eel piece. Will be returning!
The quality was definitely worth the price love the experience

Better than kazunori. Omg this place is amazing. Everything was sooooo fresh and tasty. We got the classic and premium set and they were both super tasty and filling. I'm definitely coming here again and bringing friends. The price is also super good for what you get. Def a new neighborhood favorite.
hand rolls were so so so delicious!! I loved the Kampachi and the seaweed in all the rolls r god tier

Fabulous new hand roll spot in greenpoint. Service is top notch, the flavors are truly well balanced and impressive. Will most definitely be making this a regular stop in greenpoint! Best hand rolls I‚Äôve ever tried in NYC. We had the premium sampler with scallop, kampachi (my fav), toro (second fav), salmon and snow crab (real crab). So light & refreshing. Must try! Our waiter Colby was super attentive and knowledgeable- fantastic experience overall.
delicious food, great vibe, no rush! and a fair price!
Rolls were very fresh and the miso soup was good, just a little small.
Was able to walk in at prime time on a Sunday night. Food was decent although a bit expensive. I prefer Nami Nori and Kazu Nori for hand rolls.
Very high quality ingredients and perfect presentation! Great addition to Greenpoint.
This is a really nice establishment and they‚Äôre newly opened with a hand roll bar and clean interior. The food was excellent and well prepared. Definitely a nice addition to the neighborhood!
Delicious spot for affordable hand rolls with great quality!!! Ambiance is nice and will definitely come back!
they have delicious hand rolls & great value as well!! the premium set was $42 and was very filling
